= pointcloudのsubscribe =
プログラムは以下
roseus_tutorials/src/subscribe-pointcloud.l

{{{
;; kinectを先に立ち上げておく
roscd roseus_tutorials/src
roseus subscribe-pointcloud.l
/camera/depth_registered/pointsを読んで、重心のtfが/points_centroidに出る
}}}
